Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 1 Tika, Hetuduka » 1.1 Kusalattika, Hetuduka » 1.1.2 Nahetupada » 1.1.2.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naārammaṇādi
Tika, Hetuduka
Kusalattika, Hetuduka
Nahetupada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naārammaṇādi
18.
53Abyākataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1)
54Kusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
55Akusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
56Abyākataṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
57Kusalaṃ nahetuñca abyākataṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
58Akusalaṃ nahetuñca abyākataṃ nahetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
19.
59Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
60Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
61Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
62(Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṃsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
